Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 4.1
  • PCI DSS Requirement 4.1.c

What to Do

Use the latest version of SSL on servers that use SSL.

Why

SSL v2 has known vulnerabilities in it, making SSL v2 unacceptable. The latest SSL version has addressed these vulnerabilities. New vulnerabilities may be found in the future, requiring a newer version of SSL to be used.

How

Most recent web servers support the latest SSL version. The latest version of SSL is Version 3(V3). If your server does not support the latest SSL version, consider updating it or installing a newer web server.
